pages.text: The Bubblegum Strain$(br2)Base THC: 17% $(br)Base CBD: 8% $(br)Effect: Health Boost
Bubblegum Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Bubblegum Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Bubblegum Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Bubble Kush Weed in an Extractor
You can package your bubblegum weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
